books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about racial injustice in the Deep South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A chilling vision of a totalitarian future where Big Brother watches all.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of Jay Gatsby and his dream of rekindling his past love.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel of manners featuring Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: Holden Caulfield's experiences in New York City after leaving school.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The adventures of Bilbo Baggins as he seeks a share of a dragon's treasure.

books.title: Fahrenheit 451
books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.description: A novel about a society where books are banned, and firemen burn them.

books.title: Moby-Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to hunt the white whale, Moby-Dick.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.description: A chronicle of the French invasion of Russia and its impact on society.

books.title: The Odyssey
books.author: Homer
books.description: The epic journey of Odysseus returning home after the Trojan War.
